string.text: %c[ui_gray_1]The Closed-cycle Breathing System Exoskeleton suit is the newest result of the ever-growing demand for exoskeletons and protective outfits designed to withstand the harshest of Zone's environments. Similarly to SEVA and SSP class suits, the wearer is isolated from outside conditions by layers of anomaly-resistant coating and internal air filtration systems. The outmost shell based on heavy exosuit armor provides excellent protection from bullets, explosions and ruptures. The resulting weight is supported by a new generation of exoskeletons, allowing the user to move and run unhindered. The CBSE suit is as rare as expensive, therefore only the wealthiest and well-connected veterans of the Zone can afford to get one.\n \n
